channel.title: Help!
channel.description: How do i remove or add an object somewhere, such as a bankbooth, I have looked everywhere, PLEASE HELP!???

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Schedin Schedin
item.description:
@Schedin wrote:

first dont post in all caps please, anyways…

if you want to add an item go into client.java and search for makeGlobalObject(
it should look like this
makeGlobalObject(PosX, PosY, Obj ID, Direction, -10);
just fill in the posx posy etc with where and what you want that item to be.

to delete an object go into client.java and search for deletethatobject(
it should look like this
deletethatobject(PosX, PosY) i think…
just change the posx and posy to the space with the item you want deleted…

pretty easy, good luck

Read full topic
